summary: A former British spy stumbles onto a plot to overthrow Communism with the help of a supercomputer. But who is working for whom?
cast: Michael Caine|Karl Malden|Ed Begley|Oskar Homolka|Françoise Dorléac|Guy Doleman|Vladek Sheybal|Milo Sperber|Janos Kurutz|Alexei Jawdokimov|Paul Tamarin|Izabella Telezynska|Mark Elwes|Stanley Caine|Gregg Palmer|John Herrington|Hans De Vries|Fred Griffiths|John Brandon|Tony Harwood|Donald Sutherland|Michael Stayner|George Roubicek|Brandon Brady|Alex Marchevsky|Peter Forest|Reed De Rouen|James Woolf|Miki Iveria|Susan George|Jill Mai Meredith|Dolly Brennan|Frederick Schrecker|Bill Mitchell|Steve Emerson|Mark Moss|Max Kirby|Jack Armstrong|Bernard Barnsley|Rodney Cardiff|Alf Casha|Beau Daniels|Hugh Elton|Ernest Fennemore|Harry Fielder|Charles Gilliard|Åke Lindman|Pirkko Mannola|Alex Russell|Bill Strange
title: Un cerebro de un billón de dólares
